title: Riot what are these changes? It's just going downhill.
body:
I took about a month off from playing league because the game made me angrier than it gave me pleasure, so I took a break. I come back and play a couple of games, during these games I realized nothing was different and if it was, it was worse than before.

Nasus jungle is a thing now I guess, 12 stacks a monster? This made it to live servers?
Enemy Nasus has 400+ stacks at 14 minutes from AFK farming his jungle. Unless you play an invading jungler there is nothing you can do, almost no one can outscale Nasus, why did they buff him so much in the jungle? Nasus stopped working because late game stopped being a thing, how can I combat a Nasus who AFK farms then just runs at me with 400+ stacks at 14 minutes in? 

Like seriously, I am asking if anyone has a strategy to combat this besides perma-banning him? 

Has Riot addressed this issue? Or am I the only one tilted by this?

EDIT: I'm just pointing out how playing a non-aggressive, non-invading, or non-early game jungler has a hard time against this. When you come face to face with a level 6ish Nasus with 75+ish stacks he's very hard to beat in a 1v1.

replies.body: You don't need to stop nasus your jungle will just shit on every lane while nasus does nothing but farm all game.

But the mid-game where people finally group up is so hard to play when he can just half health people with a Q because he has 500 stacks at 20 minutes.
I'm not saying its the worst thing in the world it just seems overly strong. Not many people can 1v1 a Nasus who has 72 stacks at level 5 is my point. Unless you play an aggressive invading jungler you're gonna have a bad time.
Nasus will never get anywhere close to 400 stacks by 14 mins he can barely get 300 stacks by 14 mins.

I literally just played a game where  Nasus had 401 stacks at 14 minutes. There are several videos of him getting up to 500 stacks at 15 minutes. Each clear is a minimum of 72 stacks, if he only got a stack from the largest monster from each camp not including taxing, scuttle, or pressing Q on the smaller monsters. 

Maybe before the buff this was true but I literally just saw it with my own eyes and there are several videos of him doing it easily.

> [{quoted}](name=Wilyum,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JnrYH3tm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-11T18:31:26.585+0000)
>
> I literally just played a game where  Nasus had 401 stacks at 14 minutes. There are several videos of him getting up to 500 stacks at 15 minutes. Each clear is a minimum of 72 stacks, if he only got a stack from the largest monster from each camp not including taxing, scuttle, or pressing Q on the smaller monsters. 
> 
> Maybe before the buff this was true but I literally just saw it with my own eyes and there are several videos of him doing it easily.

If the minimum is 72 that means he has to clear the jg 6 times to reach 400 both red and blue buff take 5 mins to respawn so can only take 3 of them by 16 mins the rest of the buff respawn every 2.30 mins meaning you will have only taken them 5 times and that is not counting the time it takes to clear and nasus does not have amazing clear so the number will be lower.The math does not add up at all so why are you lying.

Yes, the minimum is 72, the max is 120 (I believe it might actually be slightly less than that).
He had 1 kill and farmed at least 2 waves off of top lane. 
I agree, he could not get 400 by just farming the jungle but I never said that, I said he afk farmed. He cleared jungle went and killed our top laner took two+ waves then backed and cleared jungle again and held mid while his mid was back. He was not actively ganking he was passively farming for the first 14 minutes including holding lanes.

Why is everyone so quick to just call people liars on the internet? If I knew how I would show you the game.

Why are you in the circlejerk of people saying he cant get 300 stacks that quick? You need to do some fcking math before you even argue about this.

JUST DO YOU FCKING CALCULATIONS! I HAVE AND MANY OTHER PEOPLE HAVE TOO.

> [{quoted}](name=Ferrinova,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JnrYH3tm,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-01-11T18:51:10.241+0000)
>
> Why are you in the circlejerk of people saying he cant get 300 stacks that quick? You need to do some fcking math before you even argue about this.
> 
> JUST DO YOU FCKING CALCULATIONS! I HAVE AND MANY OTHER PEOPLE HAVE TOO.

I just did the math it is impossible so you clearly did not.

wtf. Your post history says it all. You have people literally showing you the math, and your responding to them, saying they didnt do it right and this is irrelivant? what the fck are you trying to gain from this?

> [{quoted}](name=Ferrinova,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JnrYH3tm,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2019-01-11T19:12:40.445+0000)
>
> wtf. Your post history says it all. You have people literally showing you the math, and your responding to them, saying they didnt do it right and this is irrelivant? what the fck are you trying to gain from this?

????? if someone does math wrong it is wrong and if someone does math wrong I will say why it is wrong unlike you who just looks at someones post history when that has nothing to do with anything other there just being a dick. What do you have to gain from lying about how many stacks nasus gets since 400 stacks from just farming jg at 14 is impossible I did the math and if you looked at my post history you should know that I did the math also you are the one that said that people like me need to do the math and I did what you said and found you can't get 400 stacks by 14 mins.
You straight up lied when you said your post history had your math on it. I saw no post even related to this other than this one.

> [{quoted}](name=Ferrinova,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JnrYH3tm,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-12T01:34:34.887+0000)
>
> You straight up lied when you said your post history had your math on it. I saw no post even related to this other than this one.

Umm so you did not look at my match history since here is my math and it was in my history too.

If the minimum is 72 that means he has to clear the jg 6 times to reach 400 both red and blue buff take 5 mins to respawn so can only take 3 of them by 16 mins the rest of the buff respawn every 2.30 mins meaning you will have only taken them 5 times and that is not counting the time it takes to clear and nasus does not have amazing clear so the number will be lower.

as you can see there is math in it and I posted it before you looked at my history.

> [{quoted}](name=Wilyum,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JnrYH3tm,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-11T18:16:07.721+0000)
>
> I took about a month off from playing league because the game made me angrier than it gave me pleasure, so I took a break. I come back and play a couple of games, during these games I realized nothing was different and if it was, it was worse than before.
> 
> Nasus jungle is a thing now I guess, 12 stacks a monster? This made it to live servers?
> Enemy Nasus has 400+ stacks at 14 minutes from AFK farming his jungle. Unless you play an invading jungler there is nothing you can do, almost no one can outscale Nasus, why did they buff him so much in the jungle? Nasus stopped working because late game stopped being a thing, how can I combat a Nasus who AFK farms then just runs at me with 400+ stacks at 14 minutes in? 
> 
> Like seriously, I am asking if anyone has a strategy to combat this besides perma-banning him? 
> 
> Has Riot addressed this issue? Or am I the only one tilted by this?
> 
> EDIT: I'm just pointing out how playing a non-aggressive, non-invading, or non-early game jungler has a hard time against this. When you come face to face with a level 6ish Nasus with 75+ish stacks he's very hard to beat in a 1v1.

how about you punish his brainless afk farming by ganking the sht outta his lanes and getting ur whole team ahead, or yea invading and stealing his big monsters is a valid counterplay. heaven forbid you actually have to do some thinking in this game.

You're missing the point almost no jungler can make a big enough impact or have a big enough lead to make the difference mid game.

When the teams group at 15-20min and nasus had 400+ stacks he's too strong he can q almost anyone for close to half their hp. 

My issue isn't him being hard to jungle against it's being hard to play mid game against, of course you can gank and get some good plays and be ahead but that doesn't matter when someone can press q every 2 seconds and deal 600+ damage each time. None of your solutions answer this problem
Boric is right, its just not possible.
